data.actual_result: The line you pasted the text to gets some weird bleed effect that falls into the lower lie.
data.expected_result: Text gets pasted and text sorts itself normally.
data.short_description: Pasting text on a line above the last line causes a form of a bleed effect.
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy some text to your clipboard. - Type a message that is over one line in the text box and do not send it. - Go to any line that is not the bottom line. - Paste the text.
